channel.title: [317] Agaroth - Gambling | Duel arena | 21 Bosses | 25 skills | 13 Minigames
channel.description:
[center][img]http://agaroth.com/5.png[/img]
[url=http://agaroth.com][img]http://agaroth.com/website.png[/img][/url][url=http://agaroth.com/forums][img]http://agaroth.com/forums.png[/img][/url] [url=http://agaroth.com/play.php][img]http://agaroth.com/play.png[/img][/url][url=http://agaroth.com/highscores][img]http://agaroth.com/highscores.png[/img][/url]
[img]http://agaroth.com/about.png[/img]
[i]Welcome to Agaroth, A Rsps with no limits. Agarothis a RuneScape private server with an endless amount of playable content. It satisfies everyone from the Skilling part of the community to the player killing community. Agaroth brings you back to the enjoyable era of pre-EoC combat and features a great community that we proudly present. There is a great amount of work put into Re-Creating the nostalgic feeling you know and love. It brings us no greater joy to know that you and you're friends are going to go back to the good old days and enjoy what we all remember as a community. With any RsPs, we all know that they're all different, But when you load up your Agaroth Client you know that there is no greater enjoyment, or passion for Scapers of all types, Agarothis a RsPs that brings you closer to the game than ever before, We pride ourselve's with the knowledge that you and you're friends are going to have an epic adventure as it comes down to Bossing, Minigames, Money Making, Skills, PvP, Shops, Events, Guides, and so much more. We can't wait until you join us, In this epic adventure you are about to embark on as a community.[/i]
[img]http://agaroth.com/features.png[/img] [b]Insane stability Big map to discover Bugfree gameplay Exellent detailed skilling 15 bosses to challange 25 skills to master 11 minigames to conquer 5 quests to complete[/b]
[b][color=#996633]Chinchompas/handcannons/morrigans specials Quick-prayers & quick-curses Fully functional lunar spellbook Custom 4 floor addictive dungeoneering Overload/extremes/spec restore herbloring 5 complex slayer master with 40+ tasks Chinchompa/impling/bird hunting Rocktail and seaturtle fishing Farming with timers and growing inc/ trees Flawless summoning with scrolls and all pouches[/color][/b]
[b][color=#666666]Proper godwars Nex to challange Tormented demons with effects Corporeal beast with weaknesses Nomad with 7 attack types Total 15 bosses and growing[/color][/b]
[color=DarkGreen][b][color=#3366ff]Entity based near flawless combat Proper item and set effects Spirit shields/dfs and damage soaking Flawless hp/stats regenerating Flower game & dicing with anti-cheat Xlog/autoclicking prevention Pk points will killstreak system Global server lottery system Fully working duel arena 3 Custom minigames 6 type of methods to travel 19 type of pets to grow Fully working summoning with scrolls 4 types of clue scrolls Ancient effigy system Armor sets and degradable brawler gloves Max cape/Comp cape customising Random events to stop cheating Dwarf multicannon and handcannon 200+ Achievements to complete 3 layer character security[/color][/b][/color]
[img]http://agaroth.com/ss/ss1.png[/img] [img]http://agaroth.com/ss/ss2.png[/img] [img]http://agaroth.com/ss/ss3.png[/img] [img]http://agaroth.com/ss/ss4.png[/img][/center]

item.description:
@rs614 wrote:

[center]


Welcome to Agaroth, A Rsps with no limits.
Agarothis a RuneScape private server with an endless amount of playable content.
It satisfies everyone from the Skilling part of the community to the player killing community.
Agaroth brings you back to the enjoyable era of pre-EoC combat and features a great community that we proudly present.
There is a great amount of work put into Re-Creating the nostalgic feeling you know and love.
It brings us no greater joy to know that you and you’re friends are going to go back to the good old days
and enjoy what we all remember as a community.
With any RsPs, we all know that they’re all different,
But when you load up your Agaroth Client you know that there is no greater enjoyment,
or passion for Scapers of all types, Agarothis a RsPs that brings you closer to the game than ever before,
We pride ourselve’s with the knowledge that you and you’re friends are going to have an epic adventure
as it comes down to Bossing, Minigames, Money Making, Skills, PvP, Shops, Events, Guides, and so much more.
We can’t wait until you join us, In this epic adventure you are about to embark on as a community.


Insane stability
Big map to discover
Bugfree gameplay
Exellent detailed skilling
15 bosses to challange
25 skills to master
11 minigames to conquer
5 quests to complete

[color=#996633]Chinchompas/handcannons/morrigans specials
Quick-prayers & quick-curses
Fully functional lunar spellbook
Custom 4 floor addictive dungeoneering
Overload/extremes/spec restore herbloring
5 complex slayer master with 40+ tasks
Chinchompa/impling/bird hunting
Rocktail and seaturtle fishing
Farming with timers and growing inc/ trees
Flawless summoning with scrolls and all pouches[/color]

[color=#666666]Proper godwars
Nex to challange
Tormented demons with effects
Corporeal beast with weaknesses
Nomad with 7 attack types
Total 15 bosses and growing[/color]

[color=DarkGreen][color=#3366ff]Entity based near flawless combat
Proper item and set effects
Spirit shields/dfs and damage soaking
Flawless hp/stats regenerating
Flower game & dicing with anti-cheat
Xlog/autoclicking prevention
Pk points will killstreak system
Global server lottery system
Fully working duel arena
3 Custom minigames
6 type of methods to travel
19 type of pets to grow
Fully working summoning with scrolls
4 types of clue scrolls
Ancient effigy system
Armor sets and degradable brawler gloves
Max cape/Comp cape customising
Random events to stop cheating
Dwarf multicannon and handcannon
200+ Achievements to complete
3 layer character security[/color][/color]




[/center]
